page.title: 15COWLEY MISSION
page.content: COWLEY MISSION WAS FOUNDED IN 1888 BUT FOR FIVE YEARS MEETINGS WERE HELD IN SCHOOLWOOD COTTAGE,COWLEY LANE.THE FOUNDATION STONE FOR COWLEY MISSION CHAPEL WAS LAID BY MR.RATTRAY ON 15TH APRIL 1893.IT WAS OPENED IN JUNE OF THAT YEAR BY DR.H.GRATTON,DIRECTOR OF THE EAST LONDON INSTITUTE FOR HOME AND FOREIGN MISSIONS.BY 1980 THE CHAPEL WAS IN NEED OF RENOVATION WHICH HAS RECENTLY BEEN CARRIED OUT.A SPECIAL SERVICE OF RE-DEDICATION WAS CONDUCTED BY THE REVEREND A.RIVERS ON SUNDAY 2ND MAY 1982.SERVICES ARE USUALLY HELD EACH SUNDAY AT 6.30P.M.
